Title: Uchuu Bouei-tai Taabou no Shinkirou Hoshi wo Sukue!
Description: ['King Kaniwa has robbed the flower\'s "preciousness" which gives life to all stars. Taabou stands up to rescue the desert star.']
Related: ['Alternative version: Uchuu Senkan Yamato: Aratanaru Tabidachi', 'Prequel: Uchuu Senkan Yamato 2202: Ai no Senshi-tachi']
